name: Gita-gem
body:
##Quotes from Bhagvatha Geetha on CLI##
Install it by doing a ``` gem install gita ```
~~~
    $ gita
    Adhering to this view these lost souls, with small intellect and cruel deeds, are born as enemies for the destruction of the world.
~~~
tagline: Quotes from Bhagvatha Geetha on CLI
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
